description: A dimension can be used to limit the scope of a metric used in a security profile for AWS IoT Device Defender.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.markdownDescription:
The tag's key.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The tag's value.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: A unique identifier for the dimension.
Name.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the dimension.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_-]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Type.description: Specifies the type of the dimension.
Type.markdownDescription:
Specifies the type of the dimension.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: TOPIC_FILTER  
Update requires: Replacement

StringValues.description: Specifies the value or list of values for the dimension.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

StringValues.markdownDescription:
Specifies the value or list of values for the dimension.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the dimension.
Tags.markdownDescription:
Metadata that can be used to manage the dimension.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the created dimension.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The ARN (Amazon resource name) of the created dimension.
